install.name: Popular Questions
install.author: HUBzero
install.copyright: Copyright 2005-2011 Purdue University. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module shows questions with the most popular (helpful) responses added to the Answers component.

param.name: limit
param.label: # to display
param.description: The number of items to display.

param.name: cssId
param.label: CSS ID
param.description: An ID to be applied to the css of the module container, this allows individual module styling

param.name: cssClass
param.label: CSS Class
param.description: A CSS class to be applied to the module container, this allows individual module styling

param.name: state
param.label: Question state
param.description: The state (open or closed) of questions to be displayed

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is re-cached
